info.name: AMO EZ on the Eyes
info.description:
Make the new dumb AMO layout more EZ on eyes by removing the White and high contrast colors.

Smooth like peanut butter for the eyes ;-)
info.additionalInfo:
V1.01 = Minor updates on some forgotten styles.
V1.02 = More fix to "Search Result" Styles
V1.03 = Fixed Front page
V1.04 = Minor change on Version page
V1.05 = Improved readability on listing page.
V1.06 = More Improvement: Now the style is Gluten Free !
V1.07 = Now with more proteins and calcium.
V1.08 = Files/Code viewer done.
V1.09 = Restored ability to save Favorite Addons or put them in a Collection (Removed by Mozarella)
V1.10 = Fixed the broken Star due to Mozilla CSP restriction (No control to users)
V1.11 = Removed Compatibility Report section of Mozilla.
